message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product at a special price. I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $12,000. What do you think?
Thanks for the offer, Alice! I'm interested, but $12,000 is a bit more than I'm willing to spend right now. Would you be open to $10,500? I think that's a fair price for both of us.

Thanks for the counteroffer, Bob. I understand that you're looking for a good deal, but I have to make a profit. I'm willing to meet you in the middle, so I'm counteroffering at $11,250. I think that's a fair price for both of us.
